{{cpp/keyword/navbar}}

===Usage===
* [[cpp/language/do|{{tt|do-while}} loop]]: as the declaration of the loop

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main() noexcept
{
    int i{0};
    
    // executes statement 'std::cout &lt;&lt; ++i;'
    // before checking the condition 'i &lt;= 2'
    do
        std::cout &lt;&lt; ++i;
    while (i &lt;= 2);
}
|output=
123
}}
